meanings.sent1: She kept misstriking the nail and couldn't hang the picture straight.
meanings.sent2: He misstriked the ball during the game, causing it to go off course.
meanings.sent3: The robot misstriked the target, hitting the bullseye on the dartboard instead.
meanings.sent4: Her misstriking of the piano keys created a jarring melody that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The archer's misstriking of the target made the crowd gasp in disbelief.

meanings.definition: A mistake in striking or hitting something.
meanings.sent1: The misstriking of the hammer caused a dent in the wall.
meanings.sent2: He made a misstrike while bowling, resulting in a gutter ball.
meanings.sent3: The misstriking of the gong at the ceremony made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her misstriking of the drum created a unique rhythm that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The misstriking of the golf ball sent it flying into the water hazard.
